txt.en: Defeat the occupying forces at Sírlond
Defeat the occupying forces at Sírlond
'A fight for the ages! We have won this day. Return anon to Baglan and tell them of your victory here at Sírlond.'

At the outskirts of Caranost, a brave group holds a line against an onslaught of Orcs pouring across the bridge from the ruins. The latest assault threatens to break the resolve of the warriors at Sírlond. It falls to you to bolster them as they come under assault.
Defeat the occupying forces at Sírlond ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
